metadata.synopsis: When trying to talk to Nightsong, exclaims that Shadowheart is preoccupied with something else.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Set the shadowheart act 2 epilogue nightsong camp night through origin debug book2. Start camp night3. Talk to Nightsong while Shadowheart is occupied

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Shadowheart needs to speak to her more than I do. Better wait until she is free.
